description:
Using the latest Essex master revision 16ea348.

I'm getting the following exception when trying to perform a resize:


2012-01-21 07:25:03,993 ERROR nova.rpc [-] Exception during message handling
(nova.rpc): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/rpc/impl_kombu.py", line 723, in _process_data
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/exception.py", line 126, in wrapped
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kw)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 127, in decorated_function
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     function(self, context, instance_uuid, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 150, in decorated_function
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     self.add_instance_fault_from_exc(context, instance_uuid, e)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/contextlib.py", line 24, in __exit__
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     self.gen.next()
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 145, in decorated_function
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     return function(self, context, instance_uuid, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.rpc): TRACE: TypeError: prep_resize() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filter_properties'
(nova.rpc): TRACE:
title: prep_resize() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filter_properties'

comments.content:
Using the latest Essex master revision 16ea348.

I'm getting the following exception when trying to perform a resize:


2012-01-21 07:25:03,993 ERROR nova.rpc [-] Exception during message handling
(nova.rpc): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/rpc/impl_kombu.py", line 723, in _process_data
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/exception.py", line 126, in wrapped
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kw)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 127, in decorated_function
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     function(self, context, instance_uuid, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 150, in decorated_function
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     self.add_instance_fault_from_exc(context, instance_uuid, e)
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/contextlib.py", line 24, in __exit__
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     self.gen.next()
(nova.rpc): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 145, in decorated_function
(nova.rpc): TRACE:     return function(self, context, instance_uuid, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.rpc): TRACE: TypeError: prep_resize() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filter_properties'
(nova.rpc): TRACE:

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/3271
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/3271
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/255ce807236e9cdfd61357208fbb12b3453b109d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 255ce807236e9cdfd61357208fbb12b3453b109d
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat Jan 21 17:31:24 2012 -0500

    Allow compute manager prep_resize to accept kwargs
    
    Fixes issues when trying to resize instances. Fixes LP bug #919642.
    
    Change-Id: I411d29404902c377088750e1ae4560b8a419d4f2
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
